name: PACK YOU! (beta)
description:
[Developed for the Quarantine Jam in just 48 hours using the  theme "Pack"]

[I didn’t have nobody to test the game with so maybe it’s really unbalanced and broken, I will try fixing it later]

PACK YOU! is a local multiplayer game created in just 48 hours for the Quarantine Jam with the theme "Pack". 

The player one moves with WASD and lift items with G, while the player two moves with the arrows and lift items with L.

In PACK YOU! you have three game modes:

PACK YOU!
On PACK YOU! you must pack the rival on your box the amount of times set on the stocks. You can lift the enemy and throw it on your box to remove a stock from the enemy, the first one that loses all stocks lose the game.
Lifting the rival consumes 40 energy, and it decreases until you drop it.
Lifting an item consumes 30 energy, and it decreases until you drop it.
Dropping an item on your box give you full energy.

PACKING!
On PACKING! you must pack the higher number of items before the time runs out.

PACK THE FLAG!
On PACK THE FLAG! you must pack the flag of the rival on your box to remove a stock from the other player, the first on running out of stocks loses the game.
Lifting the flag consumes 30 energy, and it decreases until you drop it!

I didn’t have time to program an NPC for a single player mode or customizable controls but maybe I will add it later, I also want to fix a lot of things and upgrade de graphics. Hope you have fun with the game anyways:).

Game by elPiero

Music by  Metaruka.
